hasMenuItem.name: Mediterranean Chicken

Le tout, saupoudré d’origan. (1600 Cal.)

hasMenuItem.name: Game Day Large Bundle: Large 3 Meat Feast Pizza, Caesar Wings, and Crazy Bread®
hasMenuItem.description: Get all your Game Day favourites! Enjoy one Large 3 Meat Feast Pizza, one order of Caesar Wings (8 wings per order), and one order of our popular Crazy Bread®.

review.reviewBody: I can always count on Little Caesars to satisfy my pizza and wings craving.
The pizza was so good I am ordering  it a second day in a row.
Wonderfully prepared order items every time!
Barely any toppings and way to much bread. Disappointing and will never order again
